Library Functions¶

Contains common code for the project

lib.protocol.encode_command(command_type, status, section_number, device_number)¶

Encodes the provided command parameters into a byte representation of the command

Returns a byte that can be written to the serial port file for communication with PCB

Parameters:
  • command_type – Can either be ‘SET’ or ‘GET’
  • status – Can either be ‘ON’ or ‘OFF’
  • section_number – Numerical number for the section
  • device_number – Numerical number for the device
